Description: Clay magical brick decorated with a shabti.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: PM I Part 2: p.846; N. Strudwick, Masterpieces of Ancient Egypt, London 2006, pp. 216-7.

Published: J. H. Taylor, 'The Burial Assemblage of Henutmehyt: Inventory, Date and Provenance' in W. V. Davies (ed), Studies in Egyptian Antiquities: A Tribute to T. G. H. James (BM Occasional Paper 123, 1999), 59-72.
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 49)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
